means: 同意，赞同( agree的过去式和过去分词)
[语法学]（在性、数、人称或格方面）一致

sentence.Network_en: "One thing you can never insure against is corruption among your staff."—"Agreed."
sentence.Network_cn: “永远也防不胜防的就是员工内部的贪污腐败。”——“同意。”

sentence.Network_en: Richard Chamberlain has agreed to make a sequel to "The Thorn Birds".
sentence.Network_cn: 理查德·张伯伦已经同意接拍《荆棘鸟》的续集。

sentence.Network_en: Both sides have agreed to demobilize 70% of their armies.
sentence.Network_cn: 双方都同意各自遣散70%的军队。

PerfectNetExp.abs: On that day , me and my friends agreed well with the water to catch tadpoles ., 那天 , 我和我的朋友约定好了一起去水中捉蝌蚪.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... agreed charge 优待运费 agreed 同意的 agressire 攻击的.
The Cuban Foreign Minister says Cuba and Mexico have agreed to exchange ambassadors again ., 古巴外交部长说古巴和墨西哥已经达成协议重新互派外交大使.
In kampala Kampala they agreed on a compromised compromise resolution ., 现在在卡帕拉 , 他们达成了一个折中的想法.

list.abs: 大学英语四级常用词组 ... agree on 就…达成协议决定 agree with 与…相一致；适合 leave in the air 搁置，使悬而未决.
400个动词大全 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... meet with 遇到,遭受 agree with 同意,与...一致 combine with 与...相联合.
苏教版高一英语课本必修三单词是什么?_百度知道 ... Kent n. 肯特(英格兰一郡) agree on 对…意见一致 naturalist n. 博物学家.
高中英语动词短语分类_百度文库 ... add to 增加;扩大 agree on 对…取得一致意见 agree to 答应/接受….
常见问题 ... “Close” 关闭即可 “I Agree” 我同意，然后选择 “Next” 运行程序.

entry.tran: 达成协议的;商定的;意见一致的
entry.def: If people are agreed on something, they have reached a joint decision on it or have the same opinion about it.

example.ex: Okay, so are we agreed on going north?...
example.tran: 好，那么我们已经一致同意向北走了？

example.ex: Everyone is agreed that something needs to be done about the situation.
example.tran: 所有人一致认为需要采取措施改变这种局面。

entry.tran: 同意吗（用于征求他人意见）/ 同意（用于赞同他人意见）
entry.def: When you are discussing something, you can say 'Agreed?' to check whether the other people agree with what you have just said. You can say 'Agreed' if you agree with what someone has just said.

example.ex: 'That means we move out today. Agreed?'—'Agreed.'
example.tran: “那就意味着我们要今天搬出去，同意吗？”——“同意。”

example.ex: 'One thing you can never insure against is corruption among your staff.'—'Agreed.'
example.tran: “永远也防不胜防的就是员工内部的贪污腐败。”——“同意。”

means.word_mean: 1. united by being of the same opinion;

auth_sentence.content: The date for this was to be agreed later.
auth_sentence.res_content: The date for this was to be agreed later.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The date for this was to be agreed later.

auth_sentence.content: The allowance will be agreed with the relevant union.
auth_sentence.res_content: The allowance will be agreed with the relevant union.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The allowance will be agreed with the relevant union.

auth_sentence.content: I just agreed with them by posting that fact.
auth_sentence.res_content: I just agreed with them by posting that fact.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I just agreed with them by posting that fact.

Sentence.sentence: Members of the 4-H club agreed to follow the project through to completion, because they receive satisfaction from the results of constructive work.
In the end, the superintendents agreed to provide the data we sought, which is, after all, public information.
Well, to pick up where we left off last time, I believe we agreed that creativity is a mysterious idea.

means.word_mean: 同意的, 接受的，意见一致的

sentences.en: “Are you willing to pay that price?”“Yes, agreed.”
sentences.cn: “你愿意接受这个价格吗?”“是的, 愿意。
